column3:
The reason I'd left that undoxified was because the big comment seems to make more sense just in the file. This is how it appears in the doxygen output.
![screen shot 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/5502612/b23012f0-87a7-11e4-87cf-a6e6a5cf4926.png)

ACK changing the other lines, but I think 16 - 48 should be left as is.
@Diapolo i agree with @fanquake \nThe big ASCII-Visual-//// blocks should be not within a doxygen block.\n
_if_ you want to include it in the doxygen documentation then it needs serious reformatting to make it readable. Otherwise I'd indeed suggest leaving it as-is.\n
